title: As a User, I will see improvements to email transcripts for forms & bots including a link to live chat history

previous.title: As a Visitor, I will be able to chat with an agent within the lightbox interface and will be able to continue answering questions within the lightbox interface if no agent is available when a live chat interactions comes in forms.

next.title: As a User, I can add a live chat action into my form, from the form builder.
